1: <pb/><t>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová! <pb/>Co bitnejek ac' bit bay. Bitnokonek bay Cham, ti' wajan onxa ec'ok, cax tol yet onxa Cham.</t>
2: <t>Ayokab co tzalojc'ulal ayon Israel on ti', yetok Cham max con tz'ununi. Tzalojokonek ayon aj conob Sión on ti' yetok co Reyal.</t>
3: <t>Jalek watx' k'anej bay Cham yin canal, yuj jak'on ayilal bay Cham. Bitnokonek bay Cham yetok arpa, c'al yetok pandereta,</t>
4: <t>yujtol chi tzaloj c'ul Cham jin, ayon is conob on ti'. Ok jak' tzaloj co c'ul ayon yaynakil on ti', yuj co colbanil.</t>
5: <t>Tzalojokonek ayon yet onxa Cham ti' yuj is mayk'ak'al; toltax chon bitni yuj tzalojc'ulal yet chon wayi.</t>
6: <t>Ajokab jaw co bitni bay Dios; axa jun espada cab ye ibil aj yul co k'ab</t>
7: <t>yet chi jion ec' pak bay eb tx'ok conobal, cax chi jaon oc yailal bay nacionlak;</t>
8: <t>yet watx' chi oc cadena yin is reyal eb, c'al yin eb anima ay yikbej xol eb;</t>
9: <t>yet chi yuncan el lowbanil tz'ib yayjican yin eb. A jun miman ikbej ti', chi yak' Dios ayon is conob on ti' co masanil. <pb/>¡Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Jehová!</t>
